thread.title: SUSAN
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by SUSAN

author: SUSAN
title: SUSAN
text: Redspot did all that I expected, the car was ready, clean and in good condition. The staff were pleasant and friendly. The car was the smallest in the fleet's range and my only quibble would be that it struggled on some of the suburban hills in Hobart, especially when carrying passengers. I would use Redspot again.
